pages.text: The Byakhee is a chimeric species, containing bat, bird, and insect anatomy, and $(o)something else$(). These beasts are only known to ride the golden winds of Carcosa, under its twin black-suns. However, they may be summoned to physical space with through a $(ml:rites/dragon_of_carcosa)rite$(), though a sacrifice is required in order to create an entryway for the Byakhee to pass.
The Byakhee can be tamed and saddled like one would with a $(marked)Horse$(). Additionally, you may put $(item)Yellow Carpet$() on it.
